height: int of block's index in chain

transactions.tx_id: hash of all other data in transaction

inputs.signature_script: None (Has no requirements to meet to generate coins)

outputs.value: value of current coinbase reward + remainder of unspent output which are considered fees

transactions.tx_id: hash of all other data in transaction
transactions.locktime: unix time in seconds until outputs are valid
transactions.sender: public key of the user who submitted this transaction

inputs.signature_script: Conditions that satisfy output's pubkey script

outputs.value: value of output in 100ths of a coin
outputs.pk_script: Conditions that must be met to redeem this output stored in a list

nonce: append to this block's hash to get a minimum threshold value
